name: Memento Mori (itch) (nani, LegendaryBananaCat)
description:
What if you wanted to talk to your dead grandma, but ended up trapped in the underworld with only 3 shots to make it back?

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

Intro

💀 Memento Mori is a short 2D Platformer Puzzle game where the player takes the role of a lost soul whose meddling with the unkown took a wrong turn. 🕯

👻 It's up to you to get them out of this conundrum and find their way back to the living! 🌿

❌ Die strategically as you navigate the underworld and try to help yourself. ✝

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

Synopsis

After a seance gone wrong the protagonist is stuck in a loop. The only way to break out of the loop is to die! But not more than three times, or you're doomed! They forget to tell us these things in ghost training, who knew!

Take on the role of a lost soul whose goal is to get back to the land of the living, but an accident happened, trapping them in an endless rewind of their past.

Try to finish the four levels, and remember, not everything is as you see at first glance!

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

Controls

- WASD or ARROW KEYS to move

- SPACE to jump

- ESC or P to pause

- R to restart level

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

Main Features:
  • Rewind feature, see all your past mistakes! 🔃
  • Die and use yourself as a platform! But only thrice 🕐
  • An entire screen visible at all times, and yet, so deceiving! 👾

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

Developed by

👾 Diana Levay-  Programmer, Game Designer

👻 Joana Silva - Lead Artist,  Level Designer 

💀Anni Paz - Lead Artist

TrashPandas studio,  a small game developer team made of 3 masters students. Follow us on twitter! (coming soon!)

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

Assets Used

Sprites: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/free-2d-mega-pack-177430

Sounds: https://freesound.org/

UI:

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

Disclaimer:

This game is a work in progress, developed in haste as the first entry task for the competition, the group aims to work towards bettering it and implementing custom assets in the future, so stay tuned!
